title: Fighting Words
description: (based on a true story)Max was just a thirteen year old nobody – until the fight.He didn’t plan the fight. He didn’t even want the fight to happen – but after he stood up to Rodney freaking Hammerhead to protect his sort-of-best-friend Tommy – Max decided that fighting could be a good thing.People looked up to fighters.Girls liked fighters.Now Tommy and Max have decided to create their own personal fight club.It seemed like a good idea – but what can I tell you?Sometimes stupid just gets in your eyes.
author: Steve Vernon
